mapper.select: select tb_course.course_name, tb_course.type, tb_course.credit from tb_course where tb_course.course_name = #{courseName};
select * from tb_course where tb_course.school_year = #{schoolYear} and tb_course.semester = #{semester};
select * from tb_course where tb_course.school_year = #{schoolYear} and tb_course.semester = #{semester} and tb_course.classes like concat('%', #{classId}, '%');

select * from tb_course where tb_course.school_year = #{schoolYear} and tb_course.semester = #{semester} and tb_course.course_name = #{courseName} and tb_course.credit = #{credit} and tb_course.type = #{type}
